external_games.name: MechWarrior Online - Scaleshot Legendary Mech Pack

name: MechWarrior Online: Scaleshot Legendary Mech Pack
summary: Presenting the Viper "Scaleshot" Legendary Mech with unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.
